name: Plumbing
description: The installation, repair, and maintenance of systems involving water supply, drainage, and sewage using pipes, fixtures, and fittings.

name: Painting
description: The preparation and application of paint or other finishes to interior and exterior surfaces for decorative or protective purposes.

name: Carpentry
description: The construction, installation, and repair of structures and objects made of wood, including framing, cabinetry, and furniture.

name: Electrical Work
description: The installation and maintenance of wiring, circuit breakers, and electrical systems for residential, commercial, and industrial use.

name: Landscaping
description: Designing, installing, and maintaining outdoor areas such as gardens, lawns, and pathways using plants, hardscapes, and irrigation systems.

name: Masonry
description: The construction of structures using brick, stone, or concrete blocks, often involving mortar and specialized tools.

name: Roofing
description: Installation and repair of roofs using materials such as shingles, metal, tiles, and membranes to provide weather protection.

name: HVAC
description: Installation, maintenance, and repair of heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems for indoor climate control.

name: Welding
description: Joining metal parts by melting and fusing them, often used in construction, automotive, and manufacturing industries.

name: Tiling
description: Laying ceramic, porcelain, or stone tiles on walls, floors, and other surfaces for functional and aesthetic purposes.

name: Drywall Installation
description: The process of installing gypsum boards (drywall) on walls and ceilings, including taping, mudding, and sanding joints.

name: Flooring
description: Installation and maintenance of various flooring materials such as hardwood, laminate, vinyl, and tile.

name: Auto Mechanics
description: Diagnosing, repairing, and maintaining automobiles, including engines, transmissions, brakes, and electrical systems.

name: Wiring and Cabling
description: Running and organizing electrical or data cabling for power, telecommunications, or internet connectivity.

name: Glass Installation
description: Cutting, fitting, and installing glass panes for windows, doors, or partitions in residential and commercial buildings.

name: Pest Control
description: Inspection, prevention, and removal of pests such as insects, rodents, and wildlife using various chemical and non-chemical methods.

name: Bricklaying
description: Building walls, chimneys, and other structures using bricks and mortar in accordance with structural and aesthetic requirements.

name: Cabinet Making
description: Custom design and fabrication of cabinetry and built-in furniture using wood, hardware, and finishing techniques.

name: Fence Installation
description: Planning and constructing fencing structures using wood, metal, or vinyl for property boundaries or decorative purposes.

name: Siding Installation
description: Attaching exterior wall coverings made of vinyl, wood, or metal to improve building aesthetics and insulation.

name: Power Washing
description: Cleaning surfaces such as driveways, siding, and decks using high-pressure water to remove dirt, mold, and grime.

name: Gutter Cleaning
description: Removing debris from roof gutters and downspouts to ensure proper rainwater drainage and prevent water damage.

name: Window Installation
description: Fitting and sealing new or replacement windows to improve insulation, lighting, and aesthetics.

name: Locksmithing
description: Installing, adjusting, and repairing locks and security systems, as well as duplicating keys and managing access control.

name: Appliance Repair
description: Troubleshooting and fixing household appliances such as refrigerators, ovens, washing machines, and dryers.
